code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import Directory from"./directory/directory.reducer";import userREducer from"./user/user.reducer";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer";import ShopAction from"./shop/shop.reducer";var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userREducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:Directory,shop:ShopAction});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
